fullstack.bio: I create immersive digital experiences, bridging the gap between robust logic and fluid design. I deliver complete solutions from database to pixel.

frontend.bio: I sculpt user interactions with pixel-perfect precision, focusing on motion, accessibility, and visual storytelling that captures the imagination.

backend.bio: I architect the invisible backbone of applications, ensuring security, speed, and massive scalability under heavy loads.

devops.bio: I build the factories that build the software, creating seamless pipelines and resilient infrastructure that sleeps so you don't have to.

database.bio: I am the guardian of data, optimising structures for complex queries and ensuring absolute integrity across distributed systems.

ai.bio: I integrate intelligent models into practical applications, teaching machines to solve human problems and automating the mundane.
